name: Bird Herder
description:
All the flightless birds from your zoo have escaped! They're panicking and running around like, well, chickens with their heads cut off. The other zookeepers have corralled them into the barricades that the police have set up, but you have to finish the job and herd them back into the zoo. You have until midnight, when the street will be opened up to traffic again. Save those dumb birds before it's too late!

The browser version can be sluggish on some computers. Downloaded versions are recommended.

Developed by ZK and Nuyhij.

Music from Devil Music and Podington Bear.
